action.selector: body > div[align]:first-child + style + table[cellpadding="0"][width="100%"] > tbody:only-child > tr:only-child > td:only-child
body > table:first-child > tbody:first-child > tr:first-child > td:first-child > table:first-child + table
body > table:first-child > tbody:first-child > tr:first-child > td:first-child > table:first-child + table + table
div[style=" cursor:pointer;  border:5px #333 solid; width:600px; margin:0px auto; min-height:66px; height:auto; "]
div[style=" margin:0 auto; width:970px; height:90px; text-align:center;"]
div[style="background-color: #ffffff; width: 728px; height: 90px; margin: -2px auto 8px auto;"]
div[style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); border-width: 1px; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); width: 300px; height: 250px;"]
div[style="background-color: white; border-width: 2px; border-style: dashed; border-color: white;"]
